plot: The time is set in the Mechatronics Era in the future. In this era, schools actually float in the Tokyo sky at around 2000–3000 meters. At home, there is freedom in movement as everyone has a flight mechanism within them which allows them to fly. Transportation is made easy as a result.
opening_theme: "Konpora Kid" (コンポラキッド) by Waffle
ending_theme: "Mirai Gakuen TORAD" (未来学園ＴＯＲＡＤ) by Waffle
